annoyed-bull.description: a bull that is annoyed by your presence
annoyed-bull.death-text: gets so annoyed it explodes into confetti

evil-turkey.description: a turkey consumed and defined by darkness and shadow
evil-turkey.attack-hit-text: frightens you with its terrible gobble
evil-turkey.attack-miss-text: tries to roar, but squeaks instead

wargle.description: an incredibly large waffle with glowing red eyes
wargle.attack-miss-text: gets the trees all sticky, but misses you
wargle.damaged-text: screams as you bite a chunk out of its delicious flesh
wargle.death-text: is shocked by your actions and runs away into the unknown

chickadeevil.description: a robotic chickadee with malevolent programming
chickadeevil.attack-hit-text: burns you with its laser vision
chickadeevil.attack-miss-text: is distracted by a cyborg worm
chickadeevil.death-text: explodes in a fireball so large you must suspend disbelief

justice-knight.description: a knight who loves justice a lot
justice-knight.attack-hit-text: justices you very hard in the head
justice-knight.attack-miss-text: gave a lecture on justice and forgot to attack you

parrot-buccaneer.description: a four-story parrot with a pirate on its shoulder
parrot-buccaneer.attack-hit-text: attacked you with the chainsaw on its right hand
parrot-buccaneer.attack-miss-text: allowed its two eyepatches to affect its aim
parrot-buccaneer.death-text: is dead! The Dread Pirate Nobeard has been freed

boss.description: EMPEROR ROTHNAR ULGARON, FEASTER OF DARKNESS, a chipmunk in 98 foot tall robotic battle armor that makes his head look tiny
boss.short: EMPEROR ROTHNAR ULGARON, CHIPMUNK OF DARKNESS
boss.plural: EMPEROR ROTHNAR ULGARON, CHIPMUNK OF DARKNESS
boss.attack-hit-text: destroys you with his utterly cute but also frightening attack
boss.attack-miss-text: is distracted by an acorn and stuffs it in his cheeks instead of attacking
boss.death-text: topples over and his suit explodes so much that it pops every kernel of corn in a mile radius. He runs off to fight another day
